text: Brandon Bailey is an American basketball coach who is an assistant under Brad Stevens with the Boston Celtics of the National Basketball Association (NBA). For the 2017–18 and 2018–19 seasons, Bailey was the head coach of the Celtics G League affiliate Maine Red Claws.https://www.nba.com/celtics/roster/coaches/brandon-bailey Bailey is from Chicago and played basketball for his father at St. Patrick High School. Bailey graduated from St. Patrick in 2004.https://www.dailyherald.com/article/20160121/sports/160129722/ ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Basketball coaches from Illinois Category:Maine Red Claws coaches Category:Boston Celtics assistant coaches
title: Brandon Bailey (basketball)
